SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BRD_NUM DESC) AS RK, BRD_NUM, MBR_NUM, (SELECT MBR_NAME FROM TBL_MBR M WHERE B.MBR_NUM = M.MBR_NUM) AS MBR_NAME, BRD_TIT, BRD_CONT, BRD_WRITE_DATE, BRD_DEPTH, BRD_PAR_NUM, BRD_DEL_CHK FROM TBL_BRD B WHERE 1=1
AND BRD_TIT like '%' || #{brdTit} || '%'
AND BRD_CONT like '%' || #{brdCont} || '%'
AND BRD_DEL_CHK = 'N') WHERE RK BETWEEN #{pageSize}*(#{pageNum}-1) + 1 and #{pageSize}*(#{pageNum})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BRD(brd_num, mbr_num, brd_tit, brd_cont, brd_write_date, brd_del_chk) VALUES((select lpad(nvl(count(brd_num),0)+1,8,'0') from TBL_BRD), #{mbrNum}, #{brdTit}, #{brdCont}, sysdate, 'N')
